Effect.en:
If a "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon 2 Level 4 "Salamangreat" monsters from your GY, including this card, but negate their effects (if any), and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Salamangreat" Xyz Monster using only those 2 monsters. You can only use this effect of "Salamangreat Zebroid X" once per turn. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
‚óè Gains 300 ATK for each material attached to it.
